original_text: Cain made love to his wife, and she became pregnant and gave birth to Enoch. Cain was then building a city, and he named it after his son Enoch.
korean_text: 아내와 동침하매 그가 임신하여 에녹을 낳은지라 가인이 성을 쌓고 그의 아들의 이름으로 성을 이름하여 에녹이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Cain made love to his wife
Cain was then building a city
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 가인은 성을 건축하고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and he named it after his son Enoch
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 성을 그의 아들 에녹의 이름을 따라 명명하였다
